'''–ü—Ä–∏–Ω—Ü–∏–ø—ã:'''
* '''Dependency Injection''': –ò—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–π—Ç–µ FastAPI's Depends
* '''Separation of Concerns''': API ‚Üí Service ‚Üí Repository
* '''Type Safety''': Pydantic –¥–ª—è validation, SQLModel –¥–ª—è DB
* '''Async First''': –ò—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–π—Ç–µ async/await –≥–¥–µ –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ

'''–ü—Ä–∏–º–µ—Ä —Ö–æ—Ä–æ—à–µ–≥–æ –∫–æ–¥–∞:'''
<syntaxhighlight lang="python">
# api/v1/streams.py
from fastapi import APIRouter, Depends, HTTPException
from sqlmodel import Session

router = APIRouter()

@router.get("/streams/{stream_id}", response_model=StreamResponse)
async def get_stream(
    stream_id: str,
    session: Session = Depends(get_session),
    current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user)
) -> StreamResponse:
    """Get stream by ID."""
    stream = await stream_service.get_by_id(session, stream_id)
    if not stream:
        raise HTTPException(status_code=404, detail="Stream not found")
    return stream
</syntaxhighlight>

== Testing Guidelines ==

=== Backend Tests ===

<syntaxhighlight lang="python">
# tests/test_streams.py
import pytest
from httpx import AsyncClient
from sqlmodel import Session

@pytest.mark.asyncio
async def test_create_stream(client: AsyncClient, auth_headers: dict):
    """Test creating a new stream."""
    response = await client.post(
        "/api/v1/streams",
        headers=auth_headers,
        json={"title": "Test Stream", "category": "Gaming"}
    )
    assert response.status_code == 201
    data = response.json()
    assert data["title"] == "Test Stream"
</syntaxhighlight>

=== Frontend Tests ===

<syntaxhighlight lang="typescript">
// features/streams/components/StreamCard.test.tsx
import { render, screen, fireEvent } from '@testing-library/react';
import { StreamCard } from './StreamCard';

describe('StreamCard', () => {
  const mockStream = {
    id: '123',
    title: 'Test Stream',
    username: 'testuser',
    viewerCount: 100,
  };

  it('renders stream information', () => {
    render(<StreamCard stream={mockStream} />);
    expect(screen.getByText('Test Stream')).toBeInTheDocument();
  });
});
</syntaxhighlight>
